metadata.title: CVE-2021-22600 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A double free bug in packet_set_ring() in net/packet/af_packet.c can beexploited by a local user through crafted syscalls to escalate privilegesor deny service. We recommend upgrading kernel past the effected versionsor rebuilding past ec6af094ea28f0f2dda1a6a33b14cd57e36a9755

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
